name: Liosalfar
description: The Liosalfar is a large elemental creature emanating bright light, known for its agility and ability to mesmerize opponents with radiant displays.
memorable: Its unique ability to charm and incapacitate foes with mesmerizing radiance makes the Liosalfar a challenging adversary.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate the battlefield and incapacitate foes through radiant powers.
relations: May be encountered alongside other elemental creatures or in arcane settings.
environment: Likely found in areas of strong elemental energy or places of light.
strengths: Immunity to psychic and radiant damage, resistant to nonmagical physical attacks, and possesses truesight.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical darkness, which causes it necrotic damage and limits its effectiveness.
attacks: Employs Radiant Touch, dealing significant radiant damage, and utilizes Ray of Light to blind opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Mesmerizing Radiance, which charms and incapacitates multiple opponents with dazzling light.
senses: Has truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
skills: Proficient in Arcana, Insight, and Perception, which enhances its ability to understand magical phenomena and sense intentions.
additional_information: Can navigate through small spaces without difficulty.
Shares traits with other radiant elemental beings.
Can adjust the radius of emitted light as a bonus action.
Begins its turn in magical darkness and suffers penalties.
Has disadvantage imposed on it for Insight checks.
test_queries: monster that mesmerizes with light display
